key.name: cycle-through-windows
key.description: Cycle back to first when when trying to navigate past last window, and vice-versa

key.name: cycle-through-workspaces
key.description: Cycle back to first when when trying to navigate past last workspace, and vice-versa

key.name: disable-notifications
key.description: When enabled you will not receive Material Shell communications about updates anymore

key.name: enable-persistence
key.description: Current session layout will be saved to disk and restored in the next start
